title: 我正在准备一份题为“世界人口”的报告。
answer: I'm preparing a report called “The world’spopulation”.

title: 等等! 我要记些笔记!
answer: Hang on a minute! I’ll make some notes.

title: 人口增长缓慢的国家怎么样呢?
answer: How about countries with slow-growing populations?

title: 没有足够的人来做所有的工作，也没有足够的年轻人来照顾老人。
answer: There aren’t enough people to do all the jobs, or enough young people to look after the older ones.

title: 他们有一座小房子,靠近田野和小山。
answer: They had a small house, close to fields and hills.

title: 交通总是很糟糕,更不用说空气污染了。
answer: Luckily, the government is making a great effort to solve Arnwick's problems with better public services.

title: 随着人口的增长,城市应该努力创造一个更愉快、更舒适、更方便的生活环境。
answer: With populations rising, cities should try to create a more enjoyable, comfortable and convenient living environment.
